page.title: 10BO'NESS RECREATION
page.content: On June 14 1985 our class kept a tally of persons using the centre between 9.00 am and 9.00 pm. We found that 1023 people used it in that time. We did a survey every 10 minutes. 73 people took part in it. We found that most of those surveyed used it for swimming.(46) Badminton and squash proved a second popular choice. Snooker,multi-gym,running,weights, fencing,life-saving and the cafe facilities were also popular. The evening was the busiest time. The majority of people using the centre lived locally,on average about 10 mins distance. We discovered that it was greatly used by the people of Bo'ness who were glad it had been built in the town.
